__compat.title: IND

foot.notes: Implemented in vt.c:500-501 as ESC D

contour.notes: ESC D implemented in processSequence; calls index()

screen.notes: IND (ESC D) implemented in DoESC() at src/ansi.c:715

__compat.title: NEL
__compat.description: ESC E — Next line, column 1 of next line

tmux.notes: Next line: CR followed by LF

bobcat.notes: Standard ESC sequence, handled in TerminalCtrl library

contour.notes: ESC E implemented in processSequence; calls moveCursorToNextLine()

screen.notes: NEL (ESC E) implemented in DoESC() at src/ansi.c:712

__compat.title: SS2/SS3

ghostty.notes: ESC N and ESC O handled in stream.zig:2215-2239, single shift G2/G3

foot.notes: Implemented in vt.c:517-525 as ESC N/O

mintty.notes: SS2 at src/termout.c:2049-2050, SS3 at src/termout.c:2051-2052

xterm_js.notes: SS2/SS3 used in keyboard output encoding but not handled as input

tmux.notes: ESC N and ESC O not in escape table

bobcat.notes: Single shift sequences, handled in TerminalCtrl library

putty.notes: ESC N and ESC O not implemented in escape sequence handler

contour.notes: ESC N (SS2) and ESC O (SS3) implemented; single shift G2/G3 charsets

screen.notes: SS2 (ESC N) and SS3 (ESC O) implemented in DoESC() at src/ansi.c:776-788

rio.notes: No ESC N or ESC O handling found

ghostty.notes: ESC 7 and ESC 8 handled in stream.zig:2134-2151

mintty.notes: DECSC (ESC 7) at src/termout.c:1952-1953, DECRC (ESC 8) at src/termout.c:1954-1955

bobcat.notes: Save/restore cursor, TerminalCtrl has high DEC VT compatibility

contour.notes: ESC 7 (DECSC) and ESC 8 (DECRC) save/restore cursor state

wezterm.notes: Handled in performer.rs:679 via EscCode::FullReset (ESC c), performs comprehensive terminal reset

foot.notes: Implemented in vt.c:480-481 as ESC c

contour.notes: ESC # 8 (DECALN) implemented; fills screen with 'E' characters

screen.notes: DECALN (ESC # 8) implemented in DoESC() at src/ansi.c:797

ghostty.notes: No implementation found for ESC SP F/G 7-bit/8-bit control mode selection. C1 controls are processed as ESC + (c-0x40) in stream.zig:748-756, but mode switching not implemented

kitty.notes: Sequences recognized but ignored - Kitty only supports C0 controls

wezterm.notes: No evidence found in code for ESC SP F/G sequences

foot.notes: 8-bit C1 controls not supported per vt.c:753 and doc/foot-ctlseqs.7.scd

alacritty.notes: No 7-bit/8-bit C1 control mode switching found

vte.notes: Recognized in ACS handler but implementation is commented out

windows_terminal.notes: ESC SP F/G dispatch SendC1Controls(false/true) in OutputStateMachineEngine.cpp:259-263

konsole.notes: No handlers for ESC SP F/G

mintty.notes: No handler found for ESC SP F or ESC SP G in do_esc() switch statement

cy.notes: ESC SP F/G not in EscDispatch

putty.notes: No ESC SP F/G sequences implemented

contour.notes: ControlTransmissionMode enum exists but ESC SP F/G sequences not implemented

mlterm.notes: ESC SP F/G recognized but 7-bit/8-bit control output not explicitly implemented

screen.notes: ESC SP F/G not handled; Screen uses c1 command for C1 reception only

rio.notes: No ESC SP F/G handling found

foot.notes: LS2 and LS3 supported (vt.c:485-497), LS1R/LS2R/LS3R not implemented

iterm2.notes: LS2, LS3, LS1R, LS2R, LS3R not implemented

konsole.notes: LS2/LS3 via ESC n/o; LS1R/LS2R/LS3R not found

mintty.notes: LS2 at src/termout.c:2034, LS3 at src/termout.c:2037, LS1R at src/termout.c:2040, LS2R at src/termout.c:2043, LS3R at src/termout.c:2046

xterm_js.notes: LS2, LS3, LS1R, LS2R, LS3R supported via setgLevel

bobcat.notes: Locking shift sequences, part of TerminalCtrl character set handling

putty.notes: Only LS0/LS1 (SO/SI) supported; LS2, LS3, LS1R, LS2R, LS3R not implemented

contour.notes: LS2, LS3, LS1R, LS2R, LS3R not found; only LS0/LS1 (SI/SO) supported

mlterm.notes: Delegated to mef library for ISO-2022 encodings

screen.notes: LS2/LS3/LS1R/LS2R/LS3R implemented in DoESC() at src/ansi.c:760-775

rxvt_unicode.notes: Only LS2/LS3 (ESC n/o); LS1R/LS2R/LS3R not supported

__compat.title: UTF-8 select
__compat.description: ESC % G — Select UTF-8 character set

xterm.notes: Implemented in charproc.c:6223. Controlled by wideChars resource and utf8_always setting

ghostty.notes: No implementation found for ESC % G UTF-8 selection. Terminal uses UTF-8 by default but doesn't explicitly handle this sequence

kitty.notes: Sequence recognized but ignored - Kitty is always UTF-8

wezterm.notes: No evidence found for ESC % G sequence; WezTerm only supports UTF-8 (per performer.rs:460 comment)

foot.notes: No handling for ESC % G found; foot only supports UTF-8 mode

alacritty.notes: No ESC % G charset selection found; UTF-8 is default and only encoding

vte.notes: Handled by DOCS command which is not implemented

windows_terminal.notes: ESC % G handled via DesignateCodingSystem() in OutputStateMachineEngine.cpp:295

mintty.notes: ESC % G (and ESC % 8) at src/termout.c:2028-2030 enables UTF-8

xterm_js.notes: ESC % @ and ESC % G both select default charset

tmux.notes: ESC % G not needed; tmux uses UTF-8 internally

bobcat.notes: SetCharset() and IsUtf8Mode() methods confirm UTF-8 support (Terminal.cpp:470)

putty.notes: ESC % G and ESC % @ for UTF-8 mode selection

mlterm.notes: No ESC % G implementation found; UTF-8 handled via encoding system

screen.notes: ESC % G not implemented; UTF-8 set via encoding command only

rxvt_unicode.notes: Native UTF-8 support but no ESC % G/@ sequences
